class.name: Phaser.Frame

parameters.name: index
parameters.help: The index of this Frame within the FrameData set it is being added to.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the frame within the texture image.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the frame within the texture image.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: Width of the frame within the texture image.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: Height of the frame within the texture image.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The name of the frame. In Texture Atlas data this is usually set to the filename.

class.help: A Frame is a single frame of an animation and is part of a FrameData collection.

public.name: clone

returns.help: An exact copy of this Frame object.

public.help: Clones this Frame into a new Phaser.Frame object and returns it.\nNote that all properties are cloned, including the name, index and UUID.

public.name: getRect
public.help: Returns a Rectangle set to the dimensions of this Frame.

parameters.name: out
parameters.help: A rectangle to copy the frame dimensions to.

public.name: setTrim
public.help: If the frame was trimmed when added to the Texture Atlas this records the trim and source data.

parameters.name: trimmed
parameters.help: If this frame was trimmed or not.

parameters.name: actualWidth
parameters.help: The width of the frame before being trimmed.

parameters.name: actualHeight
parameters.help: The height of the frame before being trimmed.

parameters.name: destX
parameters.help: The destination X position of the trimmed frame for display.

parameters.name: destY
parameters.help: The destination Y position of the trimmed frame for display.

parameters.name: destWidth
parameters.help: The destination width of the trimmed frame for display.

parameters.name: destHeight
parameters.help: The destination height of the trimmed frame for display.

public.name: bottom
public.inlineHelp: The bottom of the frame (y + height).

public.name: centerX
public.inlineHelp: Center X position within the image to cut from.

public.name: centerY
public.inlineHelp: Center Y position within the image to cut from.

public.name: distance
public.inlineHelp: The distance from the top left to the bottom-right of this Frame.

public.name: height
public.inlineHelp: Height of the frame.

public.name: index
public.inlineHelp: The index of this Frame within the FrameData set it is being added to.

public.name: name
public.inlineHelp: Useful for Texture Atlas files (is set to the filename value).

public.name: right
public.inlineHelp: The right of the Frame (x + width).

public.name: rotated
public.inlineHelp: Rotated? (not yet implemented)

public.name: rotationDirection
public.inlineHelp: Either 'cw' or 'ccw', rotation is always 90 degrees.

public.name: sourceSizeH
public.inlineHelp: Height of the original sprite.

public.name: sourceSizeW
public.inlineHelp: Width of the original sprite.

public.name: spriteSourceSizeH
public.inlineHelp: Height of the trimmed sprite.

public.name: spriteSourceSizeW
public.inlineHelp: Width of the trimmed sprite.

public.name: spriteSourceSizeX
public.inlineHelp: X position of the trimmed sprite inside original sprite.

public.name: spriteSourceSizeY
public.inlineHelp: Y position of the trimmed sprite inside original sprite.

public.name: trimmed
public.inlineHelp: Was it trimmed when packed?

public.name: uuid
public.inlineHelp: DEPRECATED: A link to the PIXI.TextureCache entry.

public.name: width
public.inlineHelp: Width of the frame.

public.name: x
public.inlineHelp: X position within the image to cut from.

public.name: y
public.inlineHelp: Y position within the image to cut from.
